name: russian-sites
description: Russian translation of the svelte.dev sites

scripts.postinstall: npm run download && npm run apply && npm run setup
scripts.update: npm run download && npm run apply && npm run setup
scripts.build:kit: npm run apply && npm run fetch:kit && cd __BUILD/sites/kit.svelte.dev && npm i -D @sveltejs/adapter-node@next && npm run build  --ignore-scripts && mkdir -p build/src && cp -r src/content build/src/ && echo '{"type": "module"}' > build/package.json
